item.name: All delete operations number per second
item.description: 请求执行的delete语句（com_delete+com_delete_multi）的和。

item.name: MySQL status
item.description:
It requires user parameter mysql.ping, which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.
0 - MySQL server is down 1 - MySQL server is up

item.name: Acl_cache_items_count
item.description: the number of cached privilege objects. Each object is the privilege combination of a user and its active role. 缓存的权限对象的数量。每一个权限对象都结合了一个用户和它激活的角色。

item.name: Binlog_cache_disk_use
item.description: numbers of transactions that used the temporary binary log cache but that exceed the value of binlog_cache_size and use temporary file to store statements for the transaction. 事务的数量。使用临时的binlog日志缓存内存但是超过了binlog_cache_size指定的内存大小而将事务语句溢出到磁盘临时文件的事务量。

item.name: Binlog_stmt_cache_disk_use
item.description: the number of nontransaction statements that used the binary log statement cache but thar exceed the value of binlog_stmt_cache_size and used temporary file to store the those statements; 非事务语句的数量。使用binlog语句缓存内存，但是超出了binlog_stmt_cache_size指定大小，而将语句存储溢出到磁盘临时文件的语句数量。

item.name: Binlog_stmt_cache_use
item.description: the number of nontransactions that used binary log statement cache. 使用二进制日志语句缓存内存的非事务语句的数量。

item.name: MySQL bytes received per second
item.description: The number of bytes received from all clients. 从所有客户端接收的字节数。

item.name: MySQL bytes sent per second
item.description: The number of bytes sent to all clients. 发送到所有客户端的字节数。

item.name: Com_begin
item.description: com_xxx语句的请求执行次数。

item.name: MySQL commit operations per second
item.description: com_xxx语句的请求执行次数。

item.name: Com_delete per second
item.description: Com_delete

item.name: Connection_errors_accept
item.description:
以com_error_xxx开始的变量统计了在连接过程中的各阶段产生的错误。这些错误不包括在host cache中统计的错误。 these variables provides information about errors thar occurs duing the client connection process. they are global and represent error counts aggregated across connections from all hosts. these variables track errors not accounted for by the host cache.
在监听端口上进行accept()调用过程中产生的错误。 the number of errors thar occured during calls to accept() on the listening port.

item.name: Connection_errors_internal
item.description: 以com_error_xxx开始的变量统计了在连接过程中的各阶段产生的错误。这些错误不包括在host cache中统计的错误。 these variables provides information about errors thar occurs duing the client connection process. they are global and represent error counts aggregated across connections from all hosts. these variables track errors not accounted for by the host cache. 由于服务器内部错误导致的被拒绝的连接的数量。例如不能启动新线程 、内存不足等。 the number of connections refused due to internal errors in the server, such as failure to start new thread or an out-of-memory condition.

item.name: Connection_errors_max_connections
item.description: 以com_error_xxx开始的变量统计了在连接过程中的各阶段产生的错误。这些错误不包括在host cache中统计的错误。 these variables provides information about errors thar occurs duing the client connection process. they are global and represent error counts aggregated across connections from all hosts. these variables track errors not accounted for by the host cache. 由于达到max_connections限制而被服务器拒绝的连接数。 the number of connections refused because the server max_connections limit was reached.

item.name: Connection_errors_peer_address
item.description: 以com_error_xxx开始的变量统计了在连接过程中的各阶段产生的错误。这些错误不包括在host cache中统计的错误。 these variables provides information about errors thar occurs duing the client connection process. they are global and represent error counts aggregated across connections from all hosts. these variables track errors not accounted for by the host cache. 当在搜索客户端连接ip地址时发生的错误数。 the number of errors that occurred while searching for connecting client ip address.

item.name: Binlog_cache_use
item.description: the number of transactions that used the binlog cache. 使用了binlog缓存内存的事务的数量。

item.name: MySQL queries per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL slow queries
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL uptime
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL version
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.version, which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.
